# Modern compositor  
with the looks

Hyprland provides the latest Wayland features, dynamic tiling, all the eyecandy, powerful plugins and much more, while still being lightweight and responsive

[Install](https://wiki.hypr.land/Getting-Started/Installation/)[

Wiki

](https://wiki.hypr.land/)

TLDR

# Features

## Smooth

Smooth transitions. Eye-pleasing animations. Great performance. Highly responsive.

![](/_app/immutable/assets/smooth_default.BtJ_3R7f.webp) ![](/_app/immutable/assets/smooth_hover.BGPU3dGv.webp)

## Easy to configure

Live reloading config. Easy configuration format. Sensible defaults. Great documentation.

![](/_app/immutable/assets/config_default.CzTps2KE.webp) ![](/_app/immutable/assets/config_hover.n-Kx2XFS.webp)

## Dynamic tiling

Automatic tiling that just works. Supports multiple fine-tuneable layouts, with even more as plugins.

![](/_app/immutable/assets/tiling_default.BN4gbYOw.webp) ![](/_app/immutable/assets/tiling_hover.C5-2lWTT.webp)

[Tearing support](https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Tearing/) [Socket-based IPC](https://wiki.hyprland.org/IPC/) [Window groups](https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Dispatchers/) [Special workspaces](https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Dispatchers/#special-workspace)

Hypractive development

[Global shortcuts for apps](https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Binds/#global-keybinds) [Touchpad gestures](https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#gestures)

## Unlock full power

Get the latest features Linux offers. Have full control over your workflow by customizing and extending it how you want.

Plugins. Customize everything with official and community extensions. Write your own easily with C++

Bindings and IPC. Control your desktop with your favourite languages or simply via IPC.

[Check out more plugins](/plugins/)

[

Also see Awesome Hyprland

](https://github.com/hyprland-community/awesome-hyprland)

A list of plugins, bindings, apps and more made by the community

Setup by [outfoxxed](https://github.com/outfoxxed/) using [hy3](https://github.com/outfoxxed/hy3) and [hyprfocus](https://github.com/VortexCoyote/hyprfocus)

Memorials of the ricing legends

# Hyprperks

[Subscribe for first-party configurations, priority support](https://account.hypr.land/pricing) and to support the development. Fully optional, but crafted with love

## First-class support

Always working, actively developed, one-click-update

![](/_app/immutable/assets/first-class_default.DC41BiLt.webp) ![](/_app/immutable/assets/first-class_hover.DARNFiDH.webp)

## Easy

Designed to stay out of your way, and let you do your thing.

![](/_app/immutable/assets/easy.CpBzv2-e.webp)

## Beautiful

Customizable, with automatic theming for everything. Crafted with love from the Hyprland team

![](/_app/immutable/assets/beautiful-perky.DP7xCMEg.webp)

[Subscribe now](https://account.hypr.land/pricing)

And a huge thank you!

pacman -S hyprland

Copied to clipboard ✔

AUR git version: [hyprland-git](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/hyprland-git/)

673Z'%20fill='%234DCAFF'%20fill-opacity='0.8'/%3e%3c/g%3e%3cdefs%3e%3cclipPath%20id='clip0_1413_1526'%3e%3crect%20width='72'%20height='72'%20fill='white'/%3e%3c/clipPath%3e%3c/defs%3e%3c/svg%3e)NixOS

programs.hyprland.enable

Copied to clipboard ✔

\>

pkg install hyprland

Copied to clipboard ✔

![openSUSE Logo](/_app/immutable/assets/opensuse.DK6UxcrZ.svg)openSUSE ![](data:image/webp;base64,)

\>

zypper in hyprland

Copied to clipboard ✔

or install “hyprland” via YaST2 Software.
